mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_base_info ( username, encrypted_password, nickname, email_address, phone_number) VALUES ( #{username}, #{encryptedPassword}, #{nickname}, #{emailAddress}, #{phoneNumber} )
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM user_base_info WHERE username = #{username}
mapper.update: update user_base_info set username= #{username}, encrypted_password= #{encryptedPassword}, nickname=#{nickname}, email_address=#{emailAddress}, phone_number=#{phoneNumber} where id =#{id}
